::Spears::

She wrapped her arms around his neck and held onto him.  She found 
that she liked having his strong arms around her.  She  rested her 
head against his shoulder.  She closed her eyes.
"You can fly if you want. I trust you." she said whispering into his 
ear.  She sighed knowing he wouldn't let her fall. She also knew that 
with her eyes closed, she wouldn't be able to see how far off the 
ground they were, so she woulnd't panic. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker grins at Spears. "Ok, then! Would you mind if we fly maybe 
three feet 
> off the ground?" he asks, instantly regretting the words, "I mean. 
Um.. 
> Nevermind."
> 
> He takes a few steps forward, coming closer to her. He bends down, 
putting 
> one arm to her legs and lifting her off the ground. She wasn't too 
heavy, he 
> could easily make it to the Ark.
> 
> "Buckle up," he says, smiling at her, as he starts walking toward 
the Ark, 
> then speeding up to a slight jog.
